    • getAllMenu

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A list of menus

    • approveMenu

      public Menu approveMenu​(Menu m, Integer approvalStatusId)
      If the menu is pending, set the approval status to the value of the approvalStatusId parameter
      Parameters:
      m - the menu object that is being approved
      approvalStatusId - This is the id of the approval status that you want to set the menu to.

      Parameters:
      date - the date of the menu
      principal - The principal object is used to get the currently logged in user.
